skills.label: Create a new project
items: Create a template from a completed project, create a project from an existing template, existing project, sharepoint task list, or excel workbook

skills.label: Create and maintain calendars
items: Set working or non-working hours and days for calendars, set a base calendar, resource calendar, and hours per day, apply calendars to project, task, and resource levels

skills.label: Create custom fields
items: Create basic formulas, graphical indicator criteria, lookup tables, and task and resource custom fields

skills.label: Customize option settings
items: Set default task types, manual versus auto-scheduling, project options, calendar options, customized ribbon, and quick access toolbar

skills.label: Set up project information
items: Define project start date, apply calendars and current date, enter project properties, display the project summary task on a new project

skills.label: Create and modify a project task structure
items: Create and modify summary tasks and subtasks, rearrange tasks, create milestones, create manually scheduled tasks, outline, set tasks as active or inactive

skills.label: Build a logical schedule model
items: Set date constraints, deadlines, dependencies, links, duration equations, effort-driven tasks, and formulas, choose a task type

skills.label: Create a user-controlled schedule
items: Enter duration, set or change the task mode (manual or auto), display warnings and suggestions, use estimated durations and user-controlled summary tasks

skills.label: Manage multiple projects
items: Create a shared resource pool, connect to a resource pool, create links between projects, resolve conflicts between linked projects, work with master projects and sub-projects, summarize data in master projects

skills.label: Enter and edit resource information
items: Enter and edit max units, resource types, resource rate table, cost per use, availability, resource group, generic resources, and cost resources

skills.label: Create and edit resource assignments
items: Use task forms, assign multiple resources, assign resources to tasks using units that represent part-time work, edit assignments

skills.label: Manage resource allocation
items: View task and resource usage, view availability across multiple projects, change assignment information, level, replace resources

skills.label: Manage resource allocations by using Team Planner
items: Display current resource allocations and assignments, manage unassigned tasks, resolve resource conflicts, level resource over-allocations, substitute resources

skills.label: Model project costs
items: Enter and assign resource-based costs (work, material, cost), cost per use, fixed costs, accrual method, apply a resource rate table

skills.label: Set and maintain baselines
items: Use multiple baselines, baseline an entire project, baseline selected tasks, update a baseline

skills.label: Update actual progress
items: Update percentage completion, actual or remaining duration, actual work, remaining work, status date, current date, actual start and actual finish, use actual work and usage views, reschedule uncompleted work, cancel an unneeded task

skills.label: Compare progress against a baseline
items: Use date variance, work variance, cost variance, and task slippage, show variance of the current plan against baseline (tracking gantt), select a view to display variance

skills.label: Resolve potential schedule problems
items: Display warnings, suggestions, and task drivers by using task inspector and task path, identify resource over-allocations

skills.label: Display critical path information
items: View the critical path in single or master projects, view total slack, display progress against baseline or deadlines

skills.label: Apply and customize views
items: Use auto-filter, apply views, group, filter, highlight, create and manage tables, sort, customize views, share a view with organizer

skills.label: Share data with other applications
items: Import data from excel, export data to excel, attach documents or link hyperlinks to supporting information, copy and paste timeline and reports to other office web apps, create and generate visual reports in excel and visio, export a timeline view to email

skills.label: Configure and display reports and dashboards
items: Report progress status, save to pdf or xps, display gantt information, schedule, or timeline, display data based on date range, create built-in dashboards and reports, change and customize built-in dashboards and reports, copy pictures, work with cumulative fields

skills.label: Connect and share data with SharePoint
items: Sync to sharepoint, share plans and get updates through sharepoint, share project plans through sharepoint (bi-directional sync of tasks, progress, and timeline elements), collect actual progress from a team through sharepoint

skills.label: Extend Project
items: Acquire apps from the office store, save files in onedrive for business, acquire templates from office.com, automate frequent tasks with visual basic for applications (vba)
